revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Internal | name = Vavoom light | class = VavoomLight | doomednum = 9825 | game = OpenGL }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:DynamicLight|DynamicLight]]→VavoomLight
 →[[Classes:VavoomLightColor|VavoomLightColor]]
 →[[Classes:VavoomLightWhite|VavoomLightWhite]]
Base class for [[Vavoom]]-type lights. A Vavoom light's Z position is absolute, instead of being relative to the floor like all other map objects. All dynamic lights can be toggled on and off with [[Thing_Activate]] and [[Thing_Deactivate]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR VavoomLight : {{Class|DynamicLight}} native {}
